channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins JUnit Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins JUnit Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-45380|2024-08-03T14:09:57.037Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20junit%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins JUnit Plugin 1159.v0b_396e1e07dd and earlier converts HTTP(S) URLs in test report output to clickable links in an unsafe manner, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-34176|2024-08-03T08:16:17.216Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20junit%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins JUnit Plugin 1119.va_a_5e9068da_d7 and earlier does not escape descriptions of test results, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Run/Update permission.
